Text: Thank you das_wookie for this excellent collection of workshop books.Greatly appreciated.

Thanks Bow/India,
I keep trying to provide content for topics I'm interested in and that I see is missing and/or not readily available.

I try and do anything I can to encourage creativity and contribute towards others making things (art, machines, toys, whatever!) for themselves and inspire others to say "I can do that!". Especially somebody younger (note, I didn't say KIDS, but it need not be just other old pharts like myself please LOL)

Take this knowledge, spread it around, and inspire others as well! Show others how to make things with THEIR own hands, and inspire them to teach others as well!
